caption: Record
description: The data model defines a schema for agentic AI data representation. The schema provides a way to describe the workload's features, constraints, artifact locators, versioning, ownership, or relevant details.
name: record

name.caption: Name
name.description: The name of the record. For example: Marketing Strategy Agent.

version.caption: Version
version.description: The version of the record. Values MAY conform to a specific versioning schema.

authors.caption: Authors
authors.description: Specifies the authors list of a record.

annotations.caption: Annotations
annotations.description: Additional metadata associated with this record.

created_at.caption: Creation Time
created_at.description:
Includes the creation timestamp. Value MUST conform to RFC-3339. For example:
2024-09-10T23:20:50.520Z,
2024-09-10 23:20:50.520789Z.

skills.caption: Skills
skills.description: List of skills associated with this record.

locators.caption: Locators
locators.description: List of source locators where this record can be found or used from.

extensions.caption: Extensions
extensions.description: List of extension models that describe this record and its capabilities more in depth.

signature.caption: Signature
signature.description: A digital signature of the record data model. This is used to verify the authenticity and integrity of the record.

previous_record_cid.caption: Previous Record CID
previous_record_cid.description: Content Identifier (CID) of the data of the record with the previous version.
